overview: The ghost of a murdered (beheaded) woman recruits other creatures of the night to join her crusade against the ancestors of the man who killed her.  Mindless, low-budget thrill show with vampires, zombies and ghosts attacking lots of victims.  Eventually, the exorcist priests (Kara Hui, Ku Feng) find ways of exterminating the various supernatural entities
title: Guys in Ghost's Hand
